questions.question_text:
A risk practitioner has been asked to recommend a key performance indicator (KPI) to assess the effectiveness of a manual process to terminate user access.
Which of the following is the BEST KPI to recommend?

choices.C: Timeframe from user termination to access revocation
choices.B: Timeframe of notification from business management to IT
choices.A: Percent increase in number of access termination requests
choices.D: Ratio of successful log-in attempts to unsuccessful log-in attempts

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
I will go with C, this is because the risk of a terminated user's access still being valid is high as they may result in an unauthorised access to systems. So the timeframe between user termination and access revocation is the key matrix in this case KPI.
